newsitem.title: UK: NWE straight run fuel-crude gives minimal support.
newsitem.headline: NWE straight run fuel-crude gives minimal support.

text.p: Activity in the low sulphur straight run market was muted
Prices were marginally stronger around $125-127 fob NWE on the back of a crude rally, but even sellers said there was little interest.

High sulphur straight run was characterised as "ticking along" with cargoes discreetly finding homes. Prices were assessed around formula +$2/4. Imports from Russia in August were up 32 percent on August at 1.8 million tonnes.
At least two M-100 straight run continue to threaten the head into the cracked market.-- London +44 171 542 8980
